Directions: In a large skillet, cook potatoes in oil over medium-high heat for 10 minutes or until lightly browned. Stir in broccoli, ham and dry soup mix. Reduce heat; cover and cook for 25 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
Ingredients: 8 small red potatoes, cut into wedges
1 (16 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli, partially thawed
1 (1 ounce) package herb and garlic soup mix*
